abstract: The departure of Andrew Mooney, who reimagined the company’s Princess line to remarkable success, is a big blow to Disney in licensing and retail.
snippet: The departure of Andrew Mooney, who reimagined the company’s Princess line to remarkable success, is a big blow to Disney in licensing and retail.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — One of the Walt Disney Company’s most senior executives, Andrew P. Mooney, abruptly resigned Tuesday morning as chairman of the conglomerate’s sprawling consumer products unit.

headline.main: Disney Abruptly Loses Its Licensing Chief
